author: sky.cactus
content: If you think there is a good opportunity to reduce bytes used by the protocol it is probably worth discussing as a proposal.  A question that will certainly come up is how much it will affect Ethereum across the board, so something that only impacts 0.1% of transactions that land on the network is less likely to get support than something that helps 99% of transactions.
